questionnaire.question: Is this system use Artificial Intelligence?

Is this system use Artificial Intelligence according to the AI definition of EU AI Act: "A system that is designed to operate with elements of autonomy and that, based on machine and/or human-provided data and inputs, infers how to achieve a given set of objectives using machine learning and/or logic- and knowledge based approaches, and produces system-generated outputs such as content (generative AI systems), predictions, recommendations or decisions, influencing the environments with which the AI system interacts.?"

Is this system use Artificial Intelligence according to the AI definition of OECD: "A machine-based system that can, for a given set of human-defined objectives, make predictions, recommendations, or decisions influencing real or virtual environments. AI systems are designed to operate with varying levels of autonomy."
